Package controllers

Class Summary
NearVenue NearVenue.java This servlet queries venues that are within or near a particular venue
TwitterSearch TwitterSearch.java This class connect to the team database and some mysql commands are perform on the data, That is, the tweets of the user are search from the database and display them as result
TwitterServlet TwitterServlet.java This is a servlet controller class for tracking public discussions on specific topics
UserDiscussion UserDiscussion.java This class find what a user is discussing in a specific location and within a range of days
UserTimelines UserTimelines.java This servlet is used to display the timeline of a user
UserVisits UserVisits.java This class tracks the locations which a user has visited
Venue Venue.java This servlet handles venue related queries
VenueSearch VenueSearch.java This class connect to the team database and some mysql commands are perform on the data, That is, the venue list from the foursquare is search from the database and display them as result
